products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Snow White Blackout Honeycomb Perfect Fit
products.description: The gorgeous pleated snow white honeycomb blackout perfect fit blind is a simple yet elegant choice. Its pure white fabric offers versatile style options. It will add a modern, classy feel to any window you choose. You simply cant go wrong with a crisp white blind. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Vanilla Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. This soft almost magnolia cream shade, can be paired with any coloured accessories for a summery vibe, or cream walls for a warmer feel. Raio vanilla is a great addition to a kitchen or conervatory with plants to help dress the room.

products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Polar White Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. Polar white goes with any style, furnishings or finish. An easy way to create a clean, crisp finish, this blackout blind could be just what you need to finish off an office or conservatory room. Product id: db-nfpl0031 fabric colour: polar white material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackoutcloudwhite perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Wilton White (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 150mm max width: 1500mm min drop: 80mm max drop: 2200mm pleat width: 20mm guarantee: 12 months controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
